thread.title: Egypt: Egyptian-Chinese Cooperation On Petroleum Research
thread.title_full: Egypt: Egyptian-Chinese Cooperation On Petroleum Research

title: Egypt: Egyptian-Chinese Cooperation On Petroleum Research
text:
Egypt: Egyptian Police Kill Three Suspected Militants Near Cairo 
Egypt and China have signed a memorandum of understanding to promote joint cooperation in the field of petroleum research, petrochemical industries, and training the Egyptian labor in the petroleum sector. 
Egyptian Trade Plenipotentiary Minister and Head of the Economic and Trade Office at the Egyptian embassy in China Ayman Ali Othman said that the agreement will open a new opportunity of cooperation between Egypt and China. 
In Statements to Al-Ahram newspaper, Othman said Chinese investments in Egypt in the petroleum sector hit USD 3.1bn. 
He noted that the memorandum of understanding includes activating the application of scientific research and promoting joint cooperation in varius fields. Egypt 
Egypt did not receive any demands of compensation nor was its ambassador to Mexico summoned, Ahmed Abu Zaid, … see more » Copyright © 2015 Egypt State Information Service. All rights reserved.
